title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.1 - Reasonable speed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.1 - Reasonable speed

State Regulations

No person shall operate a motor vehicle on the vehicular
crossing at a speed greater than is reasonable and prudent under the conditions
and without having regard to the actual and potential hazards then
existing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5703.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
